cu.explanation_en: Setting the integrity algorithm to the unknown enum 'nia9' will cause negotiation failure during the security negotiation phase and NAS registration rejection.

du.explanation_en: Setting the global log level to an unknown enum 'invalid_level' will cause logging configuration failure and potential system instability.
du.explanation_zh: 將全域日誌級別設定為未知的枚舉值 'invalid_level'，會導致日誌配置失敗，並造成系統不穩定。
